Uses of Package
game

Packages that use game
Package
Description
GUI
 
commandline
 
game
 
game.monsters
 
  • Classes in game used by GUI
    Class
    Description
    GameEnvironment
    The GameEnvironment contains everything else in the game and keeps track of game status, specifically it contains the Player entity, Shop entity, the battles the player can participate in and the number of days, current day and difficulty.
    Item
    A single Item class, which contains the behviour for heal items, damage buff items, and full revives.
    Player
    The Player entity is used both for the player as well as enemy teams you fight against.
    Shop
    The Shop conatins some stock, that is refreshed each day, and a variable tracking the total gold spent by the player.

  • Classes in game used by game
    Class
    Description
    Item
    A single Item class, which contains the behviour for heal items, damage buff items, and full revives.
    ItemBuilder.ItemSize
    An enum for the size of the item, either SMALL, MEDIUM, or LARGE.
    Player
    The Player entity is used both for the player as well as enemy teams you fight against.
    Purchaseable
    The purchaseable interface shared by Monster and Item.
    Shop
    The Shop conatins some stock, that is refreshed each day, and a variable tracking the total gold spent by the player.
